citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:10pm on
12/09/2015.
Inspector arrived at the facility at 3:10pm, knocked on the door, called the provided phone number, and left a
message. The licensee returned the call and stated that he was out of town at the time of the attempted inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:10pm on
12/09/2015.
Inspector arrived at the facility at 3:10pm, knocked on the door, called the provided phone number, and left a
message.  The licensee returned the call and stated that he was out of town at the time of the attempted inspection.
